marno.server

Class RMIServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • marno.server.Server
      • marno.server.RMIServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, RMIServerInterface

    class RMIServer
extends Server
implements RMIServerInterface
    The RMI implementation of the Marno server.

                 java.lang.String historyFilename)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a new server, ready to be run.
        Parameters:
        serverPort - the port to listen on
        historyFilename - the filename of the history file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the history file could not be opened

        Parameters:

        newUsername - the new username for the client
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the session ID is invalid or if the user could not be renamed

        Accepts a private message from a client and relays it.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        message - the emitting client's message
        Throws:
